title: Jitsu ha Onaji Shokuba ni Anata wo Sukina Hito ga Imasu Tenkin saki ha Bijo dake no Eigyousho!? - Novel Updates
genre: Comedy   Drama   Harem   Romance   Slice of Life
tags: Beautiful Female Lead   Co-Workers   Love Triangles   Male Protagonist   Older Love Interests   Younger Love Interests
author: Haran Tsumugu   波瀾 紡
description:
A romantic comedy about a working man who struggles in a workplace with only beautiful women!

Rinta Hirabayashi, who works for a recruiting company, is transferred to a sales office where there are only beautiful women!

“I will not accept a man if he is not handsome”

“This is the first time you’ll find yourself in the middle of the action.

“I just don’t like men who only judge women by their looks.

Rinta finds himself surrounded by beautiful women: a free-spirited classmate, a strict older manager, and a cool younger colleague.

Rinta’s hard work makes him unknowingly more desirable to the beautiful women in his office, who he thought were unassailable, as well as to the beautiful women at his business partners,…….

“I still love …….

And there is someone who has secretly had feelings for Rinta since high school!　

It’s very popular on the web!　This is a work love comedy that begins in a workplace full of beautiful women.>
